title: Stupidest service ever!
content: The product is fine, but the installation service is absolutely bonkers. First if all, Amazon's installation information states the installation cost includes sealing the border gaps using "heat insulating material" which according to the technicians and the service center manager, refers to "pieces of ply wood". Secondly, installation includes "fitting the ply wood only", wherein the said ply wood needs to either be provided by the customer or bought from the technicians at absurd prices. I got the borders sealed via my building manager instead, saved quite a few bucks! Carrier may be a good brand, but its employees and transparency in sharing information is surely hampering it..

title: The front plastic panel is very weak and fragile.
content: The front plastic panel is very weak and fragile. The top left and right hooks which hold the panel with the unit broke during opening for regular filter cleaning. Also at the bottom, the panel is uneven. It does not click-close at both lower left and lower right side. If you push from lower right, the lower left comes off and vice versa. It is disappointing of a brand as big as Carrier. Overall cooling effect is as expected.

title: I'm already in Antarctica with it üòÇüôåüèº
content: A good deal under 23.5K -Keeps up to the brand name and value of "Carrier" -Delivers superb cooling indeed. -Has all the features required on a cooling machine incl. Sleep mode (which increases the temperature while you sleep by 0.5-1¬∞ at the interval of every one hour), Turbo mode, Dehumidifier and what not ! -Noise levels are marginally higher than the split Ac's but it's tolerable, I don't get much disturbance while I study ! *Note- Stabilizer : You do need a good stabilizer for fixed cooling, I installed mine at an interval of 1 month and noticed a good difference + it also protects your appliance, so one must bother to use it with a good stabilizer as well Installation : The carrier team is quite responsive and works at the speed of light though I got installed mine from a local guy due to some timing and distance issues.
